Hi all, 
        In this merge, some branch is commit information is not what i want. As  my commit is merged into master but not in Release 2.7.3.If there is any wrong  occurred. Time is 2019.6.21 12:18
![图片](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/1724f3a7c49fae8c73cb221ce5f32069/xmlnote/F2A21D86A60849B0A52EF220660EB593/23123)  
Dubbo-4355 should merged into 2.7.3-release， isn't it。

hey @vio-lin , I have to say sorry for this mistake. 

First this PR should include in 2.7.3 release and thanks very much for your contribution. F
or version 2.7.3, we are not officially in code frenze for this version and also there are many chance to  include it (for example in RC). And this PR is necessary for master branch too. So for this PR, it should go to master branch first and will be pick up into release branch.

So yesterday after I check this PR and click merge button in github, I notice this PR is for release branch, instead of master. I try to cherry-pick your commit to master and push it, but because of the configuration for repo, changes to master must be reviewed so I can't push directly. then I create another PR #4364 to merge it to master. 
I thought in this way, the commit should able to keep your name and include in git history, but after click merge button, github do a squash and overwrite origin author, so the commit information is changed. Really very sorry for this mistake.

And for release branch, I revert it because changes should review and pick up when release process officially start. And I mentioned above, this change will include in 2.7.3 and I already added milestone label yesterday.

Thanks again for your contribution and sorry for this merge issue that changed commit information.

> 数据在网络上的传输耗时有统计过吗

@kexianjun 谢谢提醒，之前只统计了 服务端 -> 消费端 的网络传输耗时，忘记统计 消费端 -> 服务端 的网络传输耗时。
现在重新统计了一下，发现是在 消费端 -> 服务端 的网络传输耗时较多，整个调用耗时花在了这上面。
我想要优化这个问题应该去排查哪些方面？

CompletableFuture cannot get completed more than once.

By the time the code under `Object o = result.getValue();` is executed, the CompletableFuture the result is representing has been finished normally. 

So try to call `result.setValue(s)` to give CompletableFuture a new value will not work.

> **版本：**
> dubbo 2.6.6
> 
> **问题：**
> 目前服务提供端并没有耗时产生，但是消费端永远比服务提供端耗时长，经观察服务端0ms响应，消费端仍会存在0-5ms的耗时波动，我的预期是消费端不应该白白浪费5ms的耗时，不知该怎么优化。
> 
> **测试方式：**
> 我通过将一个RPC调用过程拆分并通过aspectj切面分别对每个过程统计耗时，步骤如下：
> **1.** com.alibaba.dubbo.remoting.transport.netty4.NettyChannel.send() （客户端发送请求）：耗时0ms
> **2.** com.alibaba.dubbo.remoting.transport.DecodeHandler.received()（服务端接收请求）：耗时0ms
> **3.** business.handle()（服务端业务处理） ：耗时0ms
> **4.** com.alibaba.dubbo.remoting.transport.netty4.NettyChannel.send() （服务端发送结果）：耗时0ms
> **5.** com.alibaba.dubbo.remoting.transport.DecodeHandler.received()（客户端接收响应）：耗时0ms
> **6.** com.alibaba.dubbo.remoting.exchange.support.DefaultFuture.get()：耗时0-5ms
> 
> 最终发现耗时全部都在DefaultFuture.get()，翻看源码也没看出什么头绪
> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19207851/59910795-371fdc80-9445-11e9-9658-270a255612de.png)
> 按理来说1-5个步骤全都没有耗时产生，那么DefaultFuture.get()不应该出现过多耗时，所以正常情况下一个RPC调用确实不超过1ms，但是DefaultFuture.get()会不稳定的出现0-5ms的耗时波动，导致整个RT上升。
> 
> 初步猜测，耗时可能是在done.await(timeout, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
> 当消费端接收响应之后会通过done.signal()唤醒在等待响应的线程，那么所产生的数毫秒耗时可能是在cpu线程间切换上面？
> 除上述步骤之外，不知道还有哪里可能出现耗时？

consumer->network->provider->network->consumer 这个里面的network都没记录的

Hello, I looked at your PR. The basic idea is to throw an exception when loading an extension point with the same name but different types, but I still have some objections to this PR. First, you will use it. What is the extension point name already used inside a dubbo? Second, if you have a conflicting extension point name, the class loading order cannot be determined, so it may be loaded into your own Filter, but is it really necessary to throw an exception? For example, when the same class loader loads a class, it is mainly loaded first. Even if there is another identical class, it is ignored by default. Do you really need to throw an exception?

你好，我看了下你的PR，基本的思路是希望当加载到相同名称但类型不同的扩展点时，抛异常出来，但我对这个PR还是有些异议，第一，为啥你会用一个dubbo内部已经使用的扩展点名称？第二，假如你起了一个冲突的扩展点名称，类加载顺序不能确定，所以有可能是加载到你自己的Filter，但是否真需要抛异常吗？比如同一个类加载器加载类时，以先加载的为主，哪怕有另一个相同的class，默认它也是忽略，真的需要抛异常吗？

其实你的想法是好的，如果冲突，那么就抛异常出来，但目前ExtensionLoader的设计是尽可能的在无法使用时才抛异常（比如类不存在），而对于key重复，因为总会先拿到一个key对应的扩展点，所以它认为是能run起来的。如果真要做到严格校验（失败就终止初始化），那就不能这样改，应该把ExtensionLoader#exceptions这个机制去掉，你觉得呢？
